name: Burger Chef Idle Game
description:
Burger Chef, the simple and fun burger making game! Start to manage a little burger shop, upgrade the shop, hire more chefs and serve the foodies around the world!

Fun feature of Burger Chef: Unlock different country themes, open a little burger shop in famous cities around the world!

How to Play Burger Chef :
- Simply tap to upgrade your burger business! Try and see how fast can you deliver those burgers to your customers.
- Use your earnings to hire new chefs, unlock new customers, expand your capacity

Be the burger master in this idle burger making game！Serve your customers with the perfect burger! Addictive idle restaurant upgrade game!
